title: Conda CLI Roadmap Updates: Q4, 2025
description: The Q4 2025 conda CLI roadmap highlights improvements coming next year, including sharded repodata support, and improving integration with PyPI.

title: September 2025 Releases
description: conda 25.9.0 and conda-build 25.9.0 have been released! 🎉

title: July 2025 Releases
description: conda 25.7.0, conda-build 25.7.0, constructor 3.12.2 and menuinst 2.3.1 have been released! 🎉

title: May 2025 Releases
description: conda 25.5.0, conda-build 25.5.0, conda-libmamba-solver 25.4.0 and conda-index 0.6.1 have been released! 🎉

title: March 2025 Releases
description: conda 25.3.1, conda-build 25.3.2, conda-libmamba-solver 25.3.0, conda-index 0.6.0, and constructor 3.11.3 have been released! 🎉
